FOOTER.desc: Langua is a platform that helps you develop English language skills in an engaging and interactive way.

S2.title: About Us
S2.subtitle: Your journey to learning English begins here
S2.desc: In Langua Learn, we believe that learning English should be fun and appropriate for every student. That's why we designed our platform to offer interactive content and educational videos tailored to your academic level, from elementary to secondary school. We're here to support you in developing your listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills, with simple and clear steps.

S3.title: Why
S3.subtitle: Our platform is designed to provide a comprehensive learning experience that helps you improve your English skills in a flexible, enjoyable, and level-appropriate way.
S3.title1: Content Tailored to Your Academic Level
S3.desc1: We offer visual lessons and interactive activities that match your academic stage, from elementary to high school.
S3.title2: Assess Your Level and Track Your Progress
S3.desc2: Start with a placement test and track your progress through regular assessments that help identify your strengths and areas for improvement.
S3.title3: Structured Learning Path and Flexible Subscriptions
S3.desc3: Follow a clear learning plan tailored to your needs, with full access through monthly or yearly subscriptions.

S4.course3_title: Speak with Confidence: Effective Conversation Skills for Kids
S4.course4_title: English Writing: From Scratch to Mastery

We're here to support you in developing your listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills, with simple and clear steps.
